Fire_Info.dnbr_offset: dNBR offset value used to calculate RdNBR: -5

Image_Spatial_Adjustment_Info.spatial_adjustment: Required spatial adjustment for co-registration of pre-fire NBR to post-fire NBR
Image_Spatial_Adjustment_Info.x_shift: X-shift adjustment: 0 meters (relative to post-fire NBR)
Image_Spatial_Adjustment_Info.y_shift: Y-shift adjustment: 0 meters (relative to post-fire NBR)

Landsat_Scene_Info.pre_scene: Pre-Fire Landsat Date/Scene ID: Landsat 5 TM; June 24, 2011 / 5034035001117510
Landsat_Scene_Info.post_scene: Post-Fire Landsat Date/Scene ID: Landsat 7 ETM+; June 18, 2012 / 7034035001217050

Data_Projection_Info.projection: Output Dataset Projection: Albers Equal Area

Fire_Subset_Info.corner_coords_desc: Image Subset Corner Coordinates (center of pixel, projected meters)

Fire_Centroid_Info.fire_centroid: Latitude and Longitude within Fire Perimeter

dNBR_Offset_Info.offset: dNBR offset value used to calculate RdNBR: -5

Product_List_Info.pre_ref_desc: Subset of Landsat scene used for pre-fire image (Bands 1-5, 7; Unsigned 8-bit GeoTIFF)
Product_List_Info.post_ref_desc: Subset of Landsat scene used for post-fire image (Bands 1-5, 7; Unsigned 8-bit GeoTIFF)
Product_List_Info.dnbr_desc: dNBR used for burn severity analysis and mapping; subset to the fire area (Signed 16-bit GeoTIFF)
Product_List_Info.thematic_dnbr_desc: Thematic dNBR; Derived by thresholding dNBR subset (8-bit GeoTIFF)
Product_List_Info.rdnbr_desc: Relative dNBR; subset to the fire area (Signed 16-bit GeoTIFF)
Product_List_Info.perim_shapefile_desc: Perimeter of detectable fire area derived from satellite imagery (ESRI shapefile)
Product_List_Info.mask_shapefile_desc: Mask for clouds, shadow, snow or anomalies intersecting fire area (ESRI shapefile)
